Summary: Flickering light appeared to be coming at us, then disappeared.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Acton
There were no other sightings in Acton on or around March 30th 2013
divs: sighting detailssitting on my back porch, i live on the edge of the san gabriel mountain range, there is nothing behind my home but forest, there are very few lights in the area. i noticed as i was looking to the sw a flickering blue\white light that seemed to be coming towards us from estimated 5 miles away. it may have been going away from us, i could not tell, but it seemed to coming towards us headed in a north direction of travel. i noticed it and joked, "check out the ufo", i thought it was an aircraft, normal one, it stayed at aprox the same spot in the sky for about 5 seconds and it disappeared, quickly faded out. it did not go below the horizon, or at least it didn't seem to. the light was in the sky for longer than 5 seconds because i noticed it before that, once i focused on it and pointed it out, it was only visible for a few more seconds and was gone. never seen anything like that before. i would guess it's location aprox above mt gleason. how i felt? i couldn't explain it away, it's the first time i've seen something and knew something was not right. somebody else had to have seen it as well.
